description: Holding Tanks: 170 litres. New upholstery 2005. Immersion heater. Stainless steel standing rigging (2001). Two Lewmar 43 sheet winches. Two halyard winches. Plough, CQR and Danforth anchors with chain and warp. Teak coachroof grabrails. Various warps and fenders. Boat hook. NASA Navtex Pro. Masthead and deck level navigation lights. Clock and barometer. Three fire extinguishers. Fire blanket. Gas alarm. Jackstays. GME MT 400 EPIRB. Horseshoe lifebuoy. Danbuoy with strobe. Security grills for companionway and hatches. Dark blue painted GRP hull with white GRP superstructure. Rubbing strake. Painted non-slip to decks. Fin keel with encapsulated lead ballast. Skeg hung rudder. Aft self draining cocpkit. The hull was epoxied below the waterline in 2001.

description: This is a rare opportunity to purchase a classic yacht which is stepped with history. Rondinella was built in 1952, with beautifully varnished mahogany woodwork she has been turning heads from the day she was launched with not only her looks but also by her performance.etnbsp; This D25 deigned by Peter Brett was a predecessor of the well known Rivals.etnbsp;etldquo;Roninellaetrdquo; featured in etldquo;Heavy Weather Sailing for Oneetrdquo;. A particular showing in the 1956 Channel Race, quoted: A remarkable performance was put up by Rondinella, the only class III boat to complete the course, for she sailed throughout the gale and crossed the finishing line second, beating all other competitors boat for boat without handicape. Having suffered damage during the 1987 Medway hurricane she was purchased by a boatyard in Chatham where she was lovingly restored over the course of a year. Owned by its current owners for 23 years, the boat has been well looked after and is pulled ashore every year, its hoped that Rondinella colourful history and pedigree can now be enjoyed by a new owner with many more years of enjoyment ahead. An early viewing of this boat is highly recommended.Viewing by appointment through our Kent Office at Gillingham Marina

Sudiki truly exhibits the many advantages gained in buying an Owner-Operator Charter Yacht with innovative solutions to reduce the work load of running/living on a boat. description: From a racing point of view, the X-Yachts X-102 Mk11 has some exceptional sailing characteristics, its forte being windward work and light winds. The boat is very responsive to rudder and sail trim, almost dinghy like. The X-102 Mk11 is both stiff and dry. The engine is located just behind the mast, weight in bow and stern is reduced to a minimum by omitting unneeded interior in these areas. This improves upwind pointing and off wind performance. This is a good example of a well and regularly maintained X102 Mk11 with lots of possibilities for cruising and racing with family and friends.

description: The Swan 411 is a rugged and fast 41 foot boat. With modest tumblehome and a sleek profile, these yachts represent some of the best of classic Sparksman & Stephens design. Maniac has crossed the Atlantic several times (1st in her class in 2004 ARC and 3rd overall), been raced in the Antigua Sailing Week several times and cruised extensively throughout the Caribbean. She is well laid out and comfortable, but, above all else, she has been meticulously maintained and upgraded. Beautiful teak decks, a large cockpit with a functional bridge deck aft of the companion way hatch which allows for easy access to winches, lines and cleats. An equally beautiful and functional interior completes the package. Maniac has been under the same ownership for 17 years and reflects a passion for excellence and precision seldom found in other yachts. description:
BAVARIA 28 SPORT OCCASION A VENDRE MOD 2012

Unité idéale pour la petite croisière.

Avec sa carène volumineuse et ses hauts francs-bords, le 28 Sport affiche une silhouette moderne et assez imposante mais conserve tout de même de belles lignes grâce à son pare-brise profilé et à son arceau incliné vers l’avant.

Bien agencé le cockpit constitué d’un salon de pont sur bâbord faisant face au coin cuisine et au poste de pilotage, offre la particularité de présenter un grand bain de soleil arrière. Très appréciable pour une unité de cette catégorie, ce solarium dissimule un vaste coffre de rangement et un accès à la cale moteur. Le cockpit comprend une banquette en U pouvant accueillir quatre à cinq personnes autour d’une table en teck (option) et d’une kitchenette assez réduite avec son petit évier, mais pouvant être équipée en option d’un grill et d’un réfrigérateur. Côté poste de barre, un siège à l’assise rabattable facilite le pilotage debout, le volant est réglable en hauteur et les manettes de gaz sont placées sur une surface plane faisant office d’accoudoir.

description: Remarks :We are delighted to offer for sale 'Hebridean Explorer' an Aquastar Custom Flybridge 50 from 1988. A truly versatile vessel which could be put to many uses. She is currently lying afloat in Brighton marina. She was in recent years coded for charter work on the west coast of Scotland (Coding has expired) She is currently being put to good use as a floating family home being frequently taken across the English Channel to France. The accommodation for the size of vessel is surprising, with three good size cabins forward, a twin aft 3 heads compartments, great galley and saloon and a very large fly-bridge deck. She has twin Mercedes V6 diesel engines giving economical displacement cruising speeds. description: Hunter 27 in eccellenti condizioni generali; questo modello è il più piccolo della linea Hunter, barca ottima per il primo approccio alla vela o chi ama veleggiare anche in solitaria. Da quando la barca è stata introdotta nel 1975, sono state costruite migliaia di esemplari.Le strutture in vetroresina sono solidissime, si evince che la barca sia stata costruita con attenzione. Presenti rinforzi in compensato nelle aree ad alta sollecitazione.  Lo scafo è ben concepito, più di quanto si possa dire per molte barche più costose della stessa categoria.Gli interni sono ben concepiti per sfruttare al massimo gli spazi e si presentano puliti ed ordinati grazie all'attenzione meticolosa dell'armatore. Anche la coperta si presenta ottimamente.

Part carpeted in forward and aft cabins, teak and holly sole in saloon. Blue Velour upholstery with, saloon folding leaf table, curtains throughout. Blinds to deck hatches forward and aft. Good chart area with large table.Sails & SparsMasthead Bermudan sloop rig. Double spreader rig, deck stepped. Silver anodised aluminium mast and boom by Z Spars, 1989. Camper and Nicholson 30 MK2;    Classic cruiser/racer with strong pedigree, which has been upgraded frequently. 20hp diesel engine. Stored ashore each winter, this 5 berth cruiser is an excellent family boat with plenty of extras. The Nicholson 32's hull was a development of the wooden South Coast One Design hull form, and was aimed as a half ton cruiser-racer type. The waterline length of 24 ft was at the time the minimum allowed to compete in offshore racing events.

Lire souvent avec des offres de vente "bon entretien", etc. En comparaison avec ce fjord, il est probablement comme neuf! Tout au long du navire n’est pas le moule, l’étincelle, la rouille ou la recherche de ce type. Pendant toutes les conversions de matériaux résistant à l'eau de mer, j'ai traité des vis V4A et de l'aluminium résistant à l'eau.
La condition est 1A! Un fjord est maintenant parfaitement terminé chantier, optimise simplement avec l'étiquette du navire. Aucune modification ou Fusch!
100% coque sèche - toutes les étapes de la table en acier inoxydable - casque et gelcoat dans le casque et la consommation de la couverture supérieure et restauré avec précision. gelcoat original, non peint.

L’élégante est absolument impeccable et fonctionne avec deux Volvo 375hp 8.1 avec seulement 195 heures environ! Le cockpit offre deux canapés encastrés séparés qui ont beaucoup de places assises avec une table de cocktail et un bar. Tout cela et elle a toujours un accès facile à la plateforme de bain. La plate-forme de bain en teck étendue offre une grande accessibilité, ainsi que des supports de pare-chocs intégrés et deux coffres de rangement pour garder les lignes et les branchements à terre à portée de main. Elle a même de la place pour une embarcation nautique ou personnelle à l'arrière. La cabine est baignée de lumière naturelle par des hublots, trois trappes et une lucarne. L'office comprend des armoires en merisier, un réchaud à deux brûleurs, un four micro-ondes et un réfrigérateur marin assorti. Le comptoir est une belle sélection de Corian. Le plancher de la cabine comporte une doublure moulée en fibre de verre avec tapis et une semelle en teck et houx pour l’office. Il y a deux chaises longues à l'intérieur qui permettent à votre entreprise de s'asseoir et de discuter, ou de regarder un film à la télévision.
Vous ne trouverez pas un état plus parfait, une meilleure performance de Doral à ce prix.

description:
DUFOUR 405 GRAND LARGE, construit par Dufour Yachts, modèle 2010, version Adventure, Volvo D2 - 55 cv (451h), 3 cabines doubles et 2 salles d'eau, tirant d'eau 1.75m, propulseur d'étrave rétractable, chauffage à air pulsé, mât enrouleur, winch électrique de manoeuvre sur le roof, capote de descente, bimini top de cockpit, pack Raymarine avec pilote automatique, GPS / lecteur de carte dans le cockpit, annexe + moteur, équipement de sécurité semi-hauturier, etc... Première main, bateau de propriétaire jamais loué. Visible en Bretagne Sud. Pour plus de renseignements : Jean-Baptiste LEMAIRE - +33 (0)6 10 25 00 03 - jb@antipode-yachts.com  
Mot du propriétaire : Nous avons acheté ce Dufour en 2010. Nous avons été séduit par les performances annoncées pour un voilier de croisière, même en version mât enrouleur et petit tirant d'eau. Les emménagements intérieurs nous ont également beaucoup plus : une couchette propriétaire très spacieuse, un carré très convivial, de nombreux rangements, la grande capacité du frigo très pratique avec ses 3 portes, et les deux salles d'eau permettant une certaine autonomie lorsque nous accueillons des amis ou la famille à bord. Enfin le petit plus, nous avons installé un dosseret sur la banquette coté plan de travail pour permettre un certain confort à la navigation. Le cockpit est très spacieux, confortable aux escales et sécurisant en navigation même lorsqu'il y a un peu de vent. Enfin ce voilier a régulièrement été entretenu par le concessionnaire. Ce Dufour 405 Grand Large est notre huitième voilier, le prochain bateau sera un trawler.

Intérieur complètement rénové (11 mois de travaux durant l'année 2018) électricité neuve, plomberie neuve, parquet neuf, moquette spéciale marine dans les cabines , décoration version grand luxe. 
le bateau est équipé et préparé Grand Voyage, gréement neuf, sablage de la coque et antifouling, moteur Yanmar 75 cv révisé complètement. 
Le beaufort 14 dispose d’un grand carré très vaste et lumineux 
avec 2 angles canapé, une table repas neuve pour 6 personnes nombreux rangements.TV LCD et hifi, coffre-fort à bord 
Les plafonds ont été refait intégralement ainsi que les revêtements muraux en formica 
Cuisine entièrement refaite et équipée, cuisinière 3 feux neuve avec four. 
Le bateau est entièrement équipé de leds avec variateur de lumière , lumière de courtoisie dans le cockpit extérieur et dans l'escalier de descente au carré. 
Le bateau dispose de 3 cabines doubles tout confort avec armoires et télé LCD dans chaque cabine, chargeur téléphones 12 volt et prises 220v. 
2 salles de bain/WC entièrement neuves avec douches. 
Une 4ème cabine pour le skipper avec un couchage simple. 
Le bateau peut accueillir très confortablement une famille de 6 personnes. C’est un bateau hauturier, facile à manœuvrer en équipage familial, performant et sécuritaire. 
C'est un excellent navigateur par gros temps et c'est l’équation idéale pour un grand voyage en toute sérénité.
Le cockpit extérieur est lui aussi très sécurisé avec tout le confort pour la navigation, bimini et capote neuves. 
coffre Osculati pour rangement cordes sur le pont

Remarks :BAVARIA 32 Built in 2002 with in mast furling and wheel steering, teak cockpit sole and seats, Volvo MD2020D 19HP sail drive (new drive diaphragm 2014) diesel inboard engine, 1100 hours, oil change at 1070 hrs, 6 berths (double forward, double aft) plus saloon, w.c. compartment with shower, hot pressurised water, Mikuni hot air heater, Fractional double spreader Selden rig with in mast furling Elstrom main sail, standing rigging replaced 2014, Furlex Crusader genoa (Furlex rebuilt 2017), Harken self tailing winches,  all lines led aft, TV, DVD, spray hood, dodgers, cockpit table, mid ship cleats, guard rail gates, 4-man life raft (2016), Lewmar anchor windlass with remote, 25lb. CQR anchor, jackstays, shore power, battery charger, chart plotter, JRC radar, VHF with dsc, handheld radio, Raymarine ST60 depth, speed, tri data, auto helm, AIS, Navtech aerial, emergency tiller, and much much more. INVENTORY :Navigation:Standard Horizon chart plotter, c-Map Atlantic European Coasts (2016) only the helm chart plotter has a single card.JRC 1500 rada.Standard Horizon VM-3500E DSC radio with VH-310 second station at binnacle (mast head VHF aerial 2014)Standard Horizon HX270 handheld radio and chargerRaymarine ST60 depth and speed (paddle wheel relocated under fore cabin sole)Raymarine ST60 tri-data (new anemometer 2013)Raymarine ST4000 wheel auto helm (new drive belt and tensioners 2016, new gearbox 2017)AMEC Cypho 150S AIS receiver connected to chart plotter (2014).Safety:Pilot gas alarm (new sensor 2018)Kidde 10SCO smoke & co/alarm (2016)3* Gloria P2GM single handed operation 2kg dry powder fire extinguisher (2013)1* 2kg Fireblitz FE36 automatic fire extinguisher in engine compartment (2013)Electric and manual bilge pumpsEmergency tillerDeck:Various fenders and shore lines ranging in length from 7.5M to 15MLewmar anchor windlass with remote control8mm galvanised anchor chain spliced to 40m multiplait1* 25lb CQR anchorJackstays to foredeck (2013)Navigation and deck lighting4-man liferaft (Sea Safe Pro Lite canister 2016)Sprayhood (new windows 2013) dodgers and binnacle coverDetachable fold down cockpit table with pockets to store winch handlesMidship cleatsGuard rail gatesCockpit locker on starboard side with access to fuel tank and cabin heater.                                                                  MECHANICAL AND RIGGING :Engine:Volvo Penta MD 2020D 19HP (oil change 1070 hrs)Hours: 1100 approx, 5500 miles.Fresh water cooled with heat exchangerTacho hours display 2016, sea water pump rebuilt 2017, exhaust hoses 2013 and 2018Sail drive diaphragm 2014Standard 15* 11 propeller 2017.Tankage:Diesel:  90 litresWater:  150 litresElectrics:Shore power (bow and stern 2013)3 x XPLORA 135L domestic batteries 125AH (2016)1 x engine start batteryKeyed bridge between domestic and engine batteries (2015)Sterling battery chargerSafeshore G170smi galvanic isolator (2013)3 x mains power sockets (1* UK single, 1* UK double, 1*DIN single)12v accessories socket.Spars, rigging, sails:Fractional double spreader, Selden rig with in-mast furling main sailStanding rigging replaced 2014Furlex 200S headsail furling (furl rebuilt 2017)Selden aluminium silver anodised mast and boomSelden rod kickerElvstrom mainsailCrusader genoaAll lines led to the cockpit2 x Harken 16 1-speed self tailing winches2 x Harken 32 2-speed self tailing winches2 x winch handles.

description: Remarks :The Watson hull was based on the Scottish fishing boat designed by G.L.Watson and has proved to be an excellent sea keeping vessel. With a moderate draft which makes it ideal for coastal cruising in comfort. The helm position is within a spacious cabin, which allows for late season enjoyment onboard. description: Remarks :Excellent example of the ever popular Beneteau Oceanis 34. This is the two cabin version featuring the “owners“ double berthed cabin to the rear and the guest cabin with full length double V-berth forward. Large companionable cockpit with bespoke cockpit cushions and fold away binnacle mounted cockpit table. This vessel benefits from the full cockpit enclosure which acts as another living area and is ideal on those bright winter days.This is the shoal draft version giving a depth of 1.85M and allows the shallower areas of our beautiful coastline to be explored. Comprehensive electronic navigation package with Raymarine C80 colour chart plotter, Raymarine ST6000 series autopilot and VHF radio with DSC capabilities.Below decks is bright and spacious with lots of natural light from the numerous deck hatches and the panoramic side windows. This boat represents excellent value at this price. Full documentation including VAT and Builders paperwork.                                                                  Accommodation :Well appointed yacht with warm mahogany faced bulkheads and parquet style flooring2-Cabin layout with “Owners“ double cabin aft and guest cabin in bow.Cream fabric seat covers removable for easy cleaningWebasto diesel fired heating extends the season and keeps the boat dryGalley to port with double stainless steel sink and pressurised hot and cold waterGas fuelled oven with two burner hob on gimbals130 Litre capacity front loading fridge with ice compartmentLarge heads with marine toilet and holding tankVanity unit with sink and shower hoseAutomatic pump out shower sumpMirror fronted and angled storage unitsAft facing chart table on starboard sideSaloon with central table with drop leavesSeating/berths port and starboard.12V lighting throughoutCurtains and blinds on all port lights                                                                  Inventory :Well equipped yacht with an inventory suitable for coastal cruising:Illuminated compassRaymarine C80 chart plotterRaymarine ST6000 AutopilotRaymarine ST60 Wind speed/directionRaymarine ST60 Tri-DataVHFElectric windlassAnchor with chain and warpNavigation lightsBoarding ladderHorse shoe buoyWarps and fendersCD player with cockpit speakersCockpit showerCockpit tableElectric and manual bilge pumps                                                                  Mechanical and Rigging :Construction:GRP constructed yacht with hi gloss white topsidesLarge self bailing cockpit with cavernous locker storage to starboard. Wide bathing platform with transom access via raised helm seat.All walkways finished in moulded non slip for safety.Large sprayhood with full cockpit canopy. New 2016Large self bailing anchor locker with electric windlass.Full set of bespoke cockpit cushions including back rests.Engine & Electrics:Well maintained Yanmar 3YM20 inboard diesel engineReduction gearbox driving stainless steel shaft and 3 bladed bronze propeller.Bank of 3x 12V batteries - New 2016These are recharged via engine alternator or battery chargerShore power unit with cabin sockets.Sails and rigging:Deck stepped aluminium spars with double set of spreadersAll standing rigging in stainless steel.Mainsheet track mounted forward of sprayhood to keep cockpit free.All running rigging in braid on braid.Semi battened mainsail mounted in a lazy bag on boom.Roller furling headsail with UV strip and luff sockUV strip and luff sock replaced in 2016Lazy bag and lazy jack lines replaced in 2016

description: AccommodationThe high quality hand finished mahogany interior is in excellent condition and offers 6/7 berths in three cabins with good standing headroom (max 6'4“).FORWARD CABIN: Twin V berths with an infill to create a double berth, shelves and beneath berth stowage with a hatch to foredeck and two portlights. Aft is a door leading to the saloon with hanging lockers and storage areas to either side.SALOON: Laid out with a U-shaped settee to port and straight settee opposite, offering decent berths either side of a central table with folding leaves and bottle storage. Stowage is provided by numerous eye level lockers and shelves whilst further space can be utilised behind and beneath the seats.GALLEY: Located aft to port is an ergonomically designed L-shaped galley offering good stowage with useful features such as a pull out cutting board. Equipment consists of a Mobilife stainless steel gimballed 2-burner gas cooker with grill and oven, double sink with hot and cold water supply and fridge with small freezer section. Nina Lucia has an extended galley design providing significantly larger work surfaces and additional storage along the aft cabin passageway. HEADS: Separate compartment aft to starboard with a marine toilet (to 65 litre holding tank), wash basin with combined shower head tap and excellent stowage.AFT CABIN: The owners aft cabin features a small offset double berth to starboard with seating or a small settee berth to port, there is also an infill to combine these and create a very generous full cabin width berth. Stowage is provided by a hanging locker forward, shelves, lockers and beneath berth stowage with a hatch to the aft deck and portlights providing light and ventilation.GENERAL EQUIPMENT: A pressurised water system provides hot and cold water throughout via a calorifier with immersion coil. Eberspacher D3LC diesel fired warm air heating system (may require servicing). Pale blue velour upholstery with complimenting curtains and teak and holly soleboards throughout. Mechanical SystemsLocated abaft the companionway, Volvo Penta MD2003T 43hp 3-cylinder turbo diesel engine (professionally reconditioned with exchange long block 2016). Freshwater cooled via heat exchanger. Single lever controls with electric start. Stainless steel fuel tank. Shaft drive to fixed pitch 3-bladed propeller.The engine was replaced with a new professionally refurbished long block (engine minus cooling, fuel, exhaust and electrical systems) in summer 2016 and was serviced in March 2017. Electrical Systems3 x 12v Batteries (new 2010) charged via engine alternator. Shorepower system with ring main, battery charger and immersion heater for hot water. Large solar panel. Electrical distribution panel.Sails & SparsMasthead rigged bermudan sloop. Selden anodised aluminium mast and boom. Telescopic combined whisker/spinnaker pole. Stainless steel standing rigging. Terylene running rigging. Slab reefing mainsail with lazyjacks and mainsail bag. Harken furling genoa system. 2 x Lewmar 46 self tailing sheet winches. 2 x Lewmar 30 self tailing mast mounted halyard winches. Lewmar 7 mast mounted reefing winch. Lewmar self tailing Genoa reefing winch.     Mainsail - Hood - very good    Furling Genoa - Hood - goodDeck Equipment    11kg CQR type anchor with 40m chain and 10m warp    Simpson Lawrence Hyspeed manual anchor windlass    Stainless steel pulpit, pushpit and stanchions with lifeline gates    Cockpit cover, sprayhood and mainsail cover in fawn    Stainless steel swim ladder    Outboard bracket on pulpit    Teak coachroof grabrails    Two dorade ventilators    Fixed windscreen    7 x Fenders    Assorted warpsNavigation Equipment    Compass    DSC VHF radio with cockpit speaker (new 2010)    AdvanSea echo sounder (new 2010)    AdvanSea wind instument (new 2010, transducer requires attention)    Standard Horizon CP300 colour GPS chart plotter (new 2010)    Autohelm ST6000 autopilot    Clock and barometer    Masthead tricolour    Navigation lightsSafety Equipment    3 x Fire extinguishers (may require servicing)    Fire blanket    Radar reflector    Plastimo 4 man liferaft (last serviced 2016)    Lifebuoy    Danbuoy    Jackstays    Harness eyes and harnesses    Foghorn    First aid kit    Lifejackets (may require servicing)    Manual and electric bilge pumpsAdditional Equipment    Inflatable dinghyConstructionAphrodite 36 built by REX Marin AB to Lloyds Construction Certification in 1988 for the London Boat Show, to a design by Carl Beyer. Teak laid decks and toe rails. Stainless steel rubbing strake. Cast iron long fin keel. Wheel steering to skeg hung rudder. Centre self draining cockpit.The teak decks (generously thick as expected from Aphrodite) have been professionally refurbished including a light sand back then completely relaid using modern materials (cabin top 2010, deck 2014) and are now in very good condition. Her gas system has also been upgraded in 2010 along with the navigation system and various other items.

description: This is a 28,96 m. Azimut 95, yacht for sale, built in 2009. She has a Fibreglass (GRP) hull and superstructure with a beam of 7,01 m. and a draft of 1,83 m. She has a cruising speed of 24 knots, a max speed of 27 knots and a range of 590 nm from her 12,000 lt. fuel tanks. She can accommodate up to 8 guests. The flybridge, one of the largest in its class, takes up a large part of the 120 square metre surface that Azimut 95 dedicates to the plein air. Towards bow, a dinette allows you to enjoy the light sea breeze and conversation with whoever is at the helm. Towards the stern area, the flybridge is equipped to accommodate three chaise lounges or the tender, should you wish to keep the stern lifting platform free, or use it to house one or two jet skis. The large windows of the deckhouse, together with those of the external areas devoted to life en plein air, boldly state this yacht's mission: that of giving its owner and his guests bright, comfortable and relaxing sojourn and cruising experiences.Accommodation - 1 x VIP Cabin - 1 x Double Cabin - 2 x Twin Cabin - 5 x Bathrooms - 2 x Crew - Cabins - 1 x Crew - BathroomDeck Equipment - Anchors2 x Lofrans - Anchor Chain - Capstans2 x Lofrans - CraneOpacmare - GangwayOpacmare - Electric Seats2 in helm station - JacuzziEntertainment Equipment - TV 46'' Pioneer - TV 42'' Pioneer - TV 26'' Sony - TV 24'' Sony - Stereo System Bose - CD / DVD Player Bose 5Galley & Laundry Equipment - Refrigerator: Sub Zero - Deep Freeze: Sub Zero - Freezer: Sub Zero 736 - Gril - Cooker: Miele - Oven: Miele - Dishwasher: Miele - Ice Maker: Isotherm Intel Marine - Microwave: Miele H4900 B - Mini Bar - Coffee Machine: Nespresso- Bosch - Sink: NIL - Trash Compactor: NIL - Wine Cooler: Sub Zero 427 - Stove: NIL - Washing Machine: Miele Softronik W-3835 - Dryer: Miele Novotronic T284Mechanical & Electrical Equipment - Engines: 2 x 1800 Hp Caterpillar - Engine Hours: 930 - Generator: 2 x 40 kW Kohler - Generator Hours: 4000 - Bow Thruster: Trac - Stern Thruster - Airconditioning: Cruisair - Water Maker: Desalinator - Batteries - Inverter: ZF 3050 - Propulsion: Shafts - Hot Water System: 2 - Fuel: Diesel - Electricity : 12V, 24V, 230V, 380V - Consumption M.E.: 490Safety Equipment - Alarm - Fire Extinguishers8 x Dry Powder & 2 x 8kg. The company Power Boats Poland Sp. z o.o. has many years of experience in selling motor boats and yachts as well as sailing yachts. Our motto is high quality of rendered services, experience in attending clients and professionalism in our activities. Our staff makes up a team of experts with enormous experience in sailing and boating in many waters. Thanks to the fact that we do not only sell boats but our passion is also power boat sports we can always provide even the most demanding client with advice on a selection of boat or yacht. We will take every effort to ensure that the unit at the helm of which one will be standing not only lives up to ecpectations but alao surpasses dreams. Since the very beginning our basic assumption and most important objective has been selling boats and yachts at the world’s highest level, which accounts for the choice of the brands we represent. 2012 JEANNEAU SUN ODYSSEY 409 - Tortola Moon BUILDERS REMARKS: Above all a yacht must be elegant with sharp lines and fine details. The new Philippe Briand designed Sun Odyssey 409 is not only elegant, but also built for speed. A modern hull with a hard chine and excellent stability makes the Sun Odyssey 409 a pleasure to sail. Conceptualized using the most powerful design software on the market, this robust, seafaring sailboat adapts perfectly to various types of sailing. BROKERS REMARKS: TORTOLA MOON is a nice example of the excellent Jeanneau 409. The cockpit is very sensibly laid out, with running lines leading safely aft. The hull and interior are excellent as hopefully the photos convey. The Yanmar saildrive engine runs very well, and looks nearly new. Having dockside air conditioning is the icing on the cake. Make an appointment to see today. AVAILABILITY: Available now. This vessel sustained damage from Hurricane IRMA, and has been deemed repairable by the surveyors.  The pictures in the vessel are from before the Hurricane.  Please contact your Sunsail Broker for more detailed information and details on the repairs.

Remarks :A very well looked after Van der stadt Offshore 8m  yacht is now for sale in Lymington , Hampshire. A nicely turned out yacht with a proven reputation as a capable offshore passage maker.  Built by  Offshore Yachts of Royston she offers a great sailing experience at a very good price.She has been updated , her engine has been reconditioned and her standing rigging replaced in 2019 .The main and genoa were new in 2011.She has pressurized hot water system with a shower in the heads compartment.Her interior is finished in teak with 4 berths and has a good separate heads and practical galley area. She is a great passage maker for both coastal and offshore trips. She has been epoxied and rewired and keel bolts replaced over the years. Maryanka has been well looked after by her present owner and is ready for this season.A current survey is available.                                                                  Accommodation :The 8m Offshore sleeps four in a forward double ,converted saloon. She has a separate heads and practical galley area. There is ample storage through out. description: Remarks :This Westerly Fulmar is in very good condition through out. 'Christel' can be viewed in the water in Lymington, Hampshire. Her engine is regularly serviced ,she has been copper coated and her sails are in great shape. 'Christel's '  interior joinery is like new and the upholstery is in very good condition. Her headlining has been redone in the saloon along with much of her electrics.She has a Raymarine C120 colour plotter , auto-helm, and all lines lead back to the cockpit for short handed sailing. For crew comfort she has a Eberspacher heater ,good sized heads, well laid out galley with fridge, and an oven , two burners and grill.The Westerly  Fulmar  was the very best Westerly ever made with over 437 being built. She sails like a dream and has a comfortable high quality interior.                                                                  Accommodation :The Fulmar will sleep up to 7 . The forward cabin has a twin berth with a fill in to form a double. The port saloon berth converts to a double with a single on the starboard side. There is also a pilot berth port side at the stern. The heads are a good size and the galley has a fridge , dry storage and a oven with grill and two burners.The interior wood is in top condition as is the upholstery. Remarks :1984 Gibsea 84 £13,995The Gibsea 84 has been in her current ownership for 13 years. The Gibsea 84 is deceptively spacious for a 28-footer with 2 cabins plus saloon giving plenty of accommodation. This boat has been well looked after and maintained. She is easy to handle and has a good turn of speed and is a capable family cruiser. She is presented in very good condition throughout, and early viewing is highly recommended.                                                                  Accommodation :The Gibsea 84 offer 6 berths in 3 cabins with approx. 5'10“ max headroom. Double berth forward with hanging locker and stowage under. Two settee berths in saloon with drop leaf saloon table. Galley to port with a two-burner gas cooker with grill. Stainless steel sink with manual cold-water supply. Moulded draining sink. Ice box. Separate heads compartment aft to port with marine toilet, and wash basin. Chart table to starboard with dedicated seat. Aft cabin to starboard with double berth and hanging locker. Blue upholstery. Curtains. Crockery and cutlery. Opening deck hatches to saloon, forepeak, aft cabin and heads. description: Remarks :This is a very sort after yacht. With her bilge keels sound rig and ample living space below,this Jeanneau Fantasia 27 makes an ideal cruising yacht at a very affordable price.This yacht was in production from 1982 to 1996 with over 1800 being built . 2014 ROBERTSON AND CAINE LEOPARD 48 – Blow n GoBUILDERS REMARKS: The award-winning Leopard 48 offers blue water performance and comfortable living spaces; this catamaran is a popular member of the Leopard line.The Leopard 48 features a large forward cockpit with direct access from the saloon and a stairway to the forward platform. Other exterior bonuses include a large and open aft cockpit with cockpit table. A raised helm station, providing excellent panoramic visibility, allows for excellent blue water maneuverability.The galley of the Leopard 48 comes equipped with top-of-the-line appliances and ample prepping space. The expertly-designed interior makes sailing not only fun, but also incredibly comfortable. Her modern lines and open floor plan set a new standard for the modern cruising catamaran.BROKERS REMARKS: BLOW N GO is a fantastic example of the new to the market Leopard 48 featuring the awesome forward cockpit.  This yacht has the desirable cherry wood interior, which exudes class. The Yanmar engines purr along and the Northern Lights Generator power up the fully air-conditioned interior to keep your guests cool in luxurious comfort. HUGE price drop to only $565k which makes this 2014 model Leopard 48 VERY good value.  Owner very motivated to sell. AVAILABILITY: Due to be released from the fleet on 30th June 2018. Please enquire for details.  Contact for possible early release.  This vessel sustained damage from Hurricane IRMA, and has been deemed repairable by the surveyors.  The pictures in the vessel are from before the Hurricane.  Please contact your Sunsail Broker for more detailed information and details on the repairs.

Opening hatch to deck.  In saloon, two settee berths. The starboard berth converts to a double.  Saloon table with engine under. Galley to port.  Two burner gimballed gas cooker with grill and oven. Stainless steel sink with manually pumped water supply.  25-gallon freshwater capacity.  Cool box.  Separate heads compartment to starboard with marine toilet and washbasin. There is a useful stowage area under the cockpit behind the companionway.Sails and SparsMasthead rigged sloop. Anodised aluminium mast and boom. Stainless steel standing rigging. Remarks :'Moonraker' a Hunter Legend 336 has just come on to the market in Lymington, Hampshire. She is in particularly good condition throughout. Hunter designed the 336 to be a big comfortable cruising yacht and they have achieved this ,she offers the best accommodation both internally and in the cockpit of any boat of this size. The saloon is very light and airy with a large dining table and comfortable seating, her upholstery is in great condition. She has a fully equipped galley with a substantial fridge , twin sinks with hot water ,plenty of dry storage and a large America oven. Her heads are well laid out with a vanity unit ,hot shower and storage lockers.The Legend 336 has a large cockpit which will seat 6/8  and features a fold up table.The Hunter Legend is very easy to sail with all lines lead back to the cockpit, she has an autohelm and a Lewmar 40 electric winch. She has a full set of sails all in good condition including an asymetric with snuffer.Moonraker is a capable cruiser and will appeal to enthusiastic sailors and to family's who enjoy comfort and luxury when out sailing.                                                                  Accommodation :The Hunter Legend 336 has extremely good accommodation for 6 . The forward cabin is a twin v berth but has a fill in to make it a double. The large saloon makes for two large singles and the rear cabin has a large double. There is full hanging lockers in both forward and rear cabin and plenty of storage throughout the yacht.The galley has a double sink,fridge and large cooker. The heads are particularly large with sink,vanity cabinet and shower. description: Remarks :Sunseeker Manhattan 73 Fly Bridge, 2012 model, presented with a blue hull and white superstructure. This is a full specification Yacht offering 4 cabins with accommodation for 8 guests in comfort. Crew cabin at the stern accessed from cockpit. Ideal for Charter operators or family cruising and offering a considerable saving with only 400 hours on her engines. Fitted with a stabilizer for comfort at anchor or cruising. The spacious Fly bridge offer 2 dining and lounge areas, wet bar with fridge and BBQ ideal for entertaining your guests. Large sun bed and seating area on the bow. This lightly used Sunseeker Manhattan 73 is one of the few available on the market today, offered ready to go, she presents great value. The cruising speed of 25knots offers economy and a range of over 325 miles, but with a top speed of 34knots for fast passage.                                                                  Accommodation :Offering accommodation for 8 guests in 4 cabins, plus a crew cabin, all with en suite facilities, this high specification Sunseeker Manhattan 73 Fly bridge model is finished in light oak. 3 x double cabins and one twin.The saloon is spacious and open plan on one level ideal for entertaining, includes a movable custom built bar incorporating a wine fridge.   A fully equipped galley with marble tops finished in light oak.Large fly bridge with a wet bar with fridge ice maker and BBQ with extensive seating for dining and relaxing as well as sun beds on the aft. description: Remarks :San Lorenzo SL108, 2012 For Sale in excellent condition, lying Spain, VAT Paid. This magnificent Yacht offers on the main deck the Saloon seating 8 persons on the “L“ shaped sofa, bar cabinet with fridge, Bar, Armchairs and luxurious carpeting leading into the Dining area which seats 8 around the fixed table. The Dining area is separated from the Saloon by a server cupboard. On the port side is a foyer which contains the dumbwaiter, storage cupboards and leads to the stairs down to the galley and up to the wheelhouse. The foyer on the starboard side leads down to the accommodation, day head, and owners stateroom.The owners stateroom has large front and side windows letting in light, comprises of a bedroom, fitted furniture to high quality, Double bed, and carpeted. Leading off the bedroom is a study with a desk and storage. There is also two walk in wardrobes, and a safe. The owners bathroom is en suite with a separate toilet and bidet, marble floor, double basins, vanity, glass shower with hand set and shower head. On the lower deck there is a VIP cabin to Starboard, with en suite bathroom, midships to port there is a guest cabin with twin beds with en suite facilities. To starboard there is another twin cabin with en-suite facilities. There is a single bed cabin to port, also en-suite,  which contains an exercise bike . There are 2 crew cabins, access is from the port side foyer down to the Galley and crew dinette. The crew accommodation comprises of one single cabin en-suite for the Captain and another cabin with 4 bunks for the crew, also with en-suite facilities. The inventory is extensive and please contact the Palma office for a complete list as well as the upgraded options she was built with.                                                                  Accommodation :Accommodation comprises of a large Master suite including a study, walk in wardrobe, and double basin, marble en suite bathroom. There is a VIP cabin, two twin cabins, one to port another to starboard, as well as a single cabin, suitable for a nanny, all cabins are en suite with luxurious bathrooms finished in marble.There are two crew cabins, a Captains cabin, and a crew cabin with 4 bunks, both are en suite.                                                                  Inventory :This San Lorenzo SL108, 2012 build has a vast inventory, please contact the Palma office for a full specification list.                                                                  Mechanical :

description: Remarks :Sunseeker Predator 62, 2007 model For Sale, 2007/ 2016, this Predator 62 with low hours, 773, on her MAN diesels presents in excellent condition, upgraded Kohler 13kw generator, 3 cabins, VIP in Bow sharing the en suite with the Twin cabin and a Master cabin en suite.  Air conditioning in all cabins with TV's, sound system. Spacious Saloon below decks with dining, seating area and the well equipped galley. The large spacious cockpit, with lounging/dining area, behind the helm station, bow and aft sunpad area. Ideal for entertaining with cockpit wet bar comprising, BBQ, Sink, ice maker and fridge. Refurbished in 2016, Custom wrapped design on its traditional white/blue hull  makes this Predator stand out from the rest. Open to serious offers. Crew cabin for 2 with their own en-suite.  Air conditioning in all cabins with TV's, sound system. Spacious Saloon below decks with dining, seating area and a well equipped galley. The large spacious cockpit, with lounging/dining area, behind the helm station, extends out to the cockpit wet bar comprising, BBQ, Sink, ice maker , and dining area. With an aft sun pad area and another on the bow makes this sports yacht ideal for entertaining. description: Remarks :Sunseeker Predator 62 For Sale, This 2008 model presents in excellent condition with very low hours on her 2 x 900hp MAN Diesels with only 520 hours on each. This is a very high specification Yacht including the Yacht Controller system, run silent exhaust on her 11kw Kohler generator, teak package, including the bathing platform, decks and saloon. The style of the Predator is distinctive and stands out as one of the most iconic sports yachts, or hardtops as they are called, on the market. Fantastic for entertaining with a cockpit wet bar, with BBQ, sink, and ice machine, large bow sun bed area, and aft seating with bimini. Manufactured in the UK to exacting quality standards this model is proven and extremely popular. This particular model has an enclosed cockpit accessed from aft by a sliding stainless steel door.What is also interesting is that there is heating fitted, which is of interest to boaters in Scandinavia and the cooler climes, allowing year round boating for the brave! This Yacht has a high specification please look at the inventory for a full list.                                                                  Accommodation :Sunseeker Predator 62, offers 3 cabins accommodating 6 overnight guests is a Master Cabin with en suite facilities, a VIP double cabin which shares the bathroom with the twin cabin. There is a separate single crew cabin with toilet and shower. All cabins are air conditioned and offer flat screen TV's and music system for the guests. There is a CD player in the cockpit, and a Surround DVD/CD Hi fi system in the saloon. The saloon has teak flooring and is accessed from the cockpit via a sliding stainless steel door. The well equipped galley offers a dishwasher, ceramic hob, fridge/freezer, Microwave/Grill combination, washing machine and Oven. description: Marnaya is a 32.30m (105'11“ft) motor yacht, custom built in 2010 by Maiora in Massarosa (Italy). The hull and superstructure are made from GRP with a beam of 6.80m (22'3“ft) and a 2.90m (9'6“ft) draft. This custom planing yacht features bow thrusters to assist manoeuvrability at low speeds.Marnaya is capable of 26 knots at max speed, with a cruising speed of 24 knots. She offers accommodation for up to 10 guests in 5 suites comprising 1 owner's cabin, 2 double cabins, 2 twin cabins and 2 pullman cabins. There is also accommodation for 6 crew members. Marnaya has a great selection of water toys and tenders onboard like a 5m Novurania Rib with 160 hp Diesel inboard, a 3.6m Avon Rib with 40 hp outboard, a Sailing Boat, a Jet Ski, Water-skis, Kneeboard, etc.Her Garage door opens to a ninety degree angle where a mattress is placed on top creating a unique and enjoyable sunbathing experience. She has a generous half-moon shaped sofa seating 10-12 persons on the spacious sun deck, which also offers a barbeque and sunbathing area.

BUILDERS REMARKS: One of the many intriguing features this yacht offers is the forward cockpit with direct access from the saloon. While a forward cockpit is conventional on the modern cruising catamaran, the Leopard 44 distinctively offers an integral hardtop bimini, protecting the forward and aft cockpit, while also creating a comfortable outdoor living space. BROKERS REMARKS:  SEE PAL is one of few 44's available for sale. The 444 is has deep narrow groove hulls is able to sail as close to wind as many a monohull. The shallow draft too provides great access to anchorages too. Features including air-conditioning and solar panels for added battery life. Do not miss this opportunity to start your cruising now in a fantastic Leopard 44. AVAILABILITY: Due to be released from the fleet on June 30th, 2017. May be released earlier please ask for details

New to the market this high volume Flybridge Motor Cruiser has a lot to offer. she is fitted with Twin Volvo Inboard Diesels. On board there is sleeping accomodation for 5 people with a seperate Toilet and shower.  In Excellent conditionThe Prestige 32 offers excellent on the water stability with her 12 foot beam.

This is a 10,80 m. Motomarine Magna 35C, used boat for sale, built in 2007. She has a Fibreglass (GRP) hull and superstructure with a beam of 3,28 m. and a draft of 0,65 m. She can accommodate up to 2 guests. The living area can be converted into a sleeping area. There is also a bathroom. It is equipped with GPS Chart plotter, VHF, Compass. Its spacious cockpit makes it ideal for fishing and boat ride. Well serviced and highly maintained is the perfect choice for those who love fishing and coastal cruising. Down in the cabin, you can stay in comfort overnight or over an entire weekend and enjoy your daily cruises. This is a boat that will make you feel entertained and comfortable! description: Remarks :This Noray 38 has been extensively refitted from top to bottom. She has excellent sails from Sanders in Lymington, a bench reconditioned engine and a Dolphin generator ,her hull has been epoxied and with her Eperspacher heating and hot water system is well kitted out for cruising anywhere in the world.She has up to date navigation equipment including a large colour plotter with AIS.The Noray 38 was built by the the famous Astilleros Lepanto yard in Barcelona. Designed by the very successful ocean yachtsman Javier Visiers as a competitor to the Swan 38 which she is very comparable to. You will not find a faster cruiser in this class and she also has proven racing credentials . A Noray 38 has won the Round Ireland race twice , come second in the Fastnet and first in the Azores and Back. 'Norisle'  is a very special yacht , she has absolutely beautiful lines , has having been meticulously refurbished and her teak decks are in very fine  condition. 'Norisle' can be viewed in Lymington, Hampshire.                                                                  Accommodation :Norisle's interior has been completely refitted  in Khaya mahogany which gives her a warm quality feel throughout. She has new upholstery in a tasteful blue.Her forward cabin has twin v berths with a filll in making a large double. The heads are to port  with an electric toilet , hot shower , attractive wood vanity cabinet and plenty of storage.Foreward to starboard is a full sized hanging cabinet and draws. The saloon comprises of a large dining table with seating  and two berths. There is a forward facing midships chart table and to the starboard rear is a large quarter berth.The galley is well laid out with twin stainless steel sinks ,hot//cold water, front opening large fridge , oven with twin burners and a microwave . This included re grinding the crank, new pistons along with new starter motor , alternator, single control lever and instrument panel  It is fair to say she runs like new.New Hurth reverse reduction gear boxDolphin M6 6-KVA 220 volt generator with Super silent St exhaust separator for quiet running.Mast rebuilt new fittings and spreadersNew boomSail cover renewed 2014Epoxied hullAll steering gear replacedSanders Main very good conditionSanders Genoa very good conditionSanders stay sail very good conditionSpinnaker poleBamar back stay adjusterNew standing rigging 2014All running rigging in excellent condition2 x 120amp service batteries1 x 120 amp starter batteries1 x 60amp generator battery2 x batteries for windlass with Sterling chargerMastervolt battery chargerNew hatches and sky lightsStainless steel pulpit and taffrail with a lifting stern gateStainless steel folding boarding ladder on stern.

description: Remarks :'Adastra' is a classic Oyster Heritage 37 cruising yacht for sale in Lymington , Hampshire. Like all Oyster's she has a high build quality and her Holman & Pye design gives great performance and  sea keeping qualities. She is well set up for long term cruising with a great inventory of navigation electronics including a large colour plotter , radar and Autohelm. On the comfort side she has a large heads, well laid out galley and a saloon which can seat the crew and the next doors crew as well . Eberspacher heating, fridge and hot water  will help keep everyone happy in port.She had a new Volvo engine installed in 2011 , which has been regularly serviced. Overall the Oyster Heritage 37 is a real classic go anywhere cruising yacht with a good turn of speed which has resulted in impressive race results over the years.She is available to view afloat  in Lymington at anytime.                                                                  Accommodation :The Oyster Heritage 37 sleeps 7. There is a twin cabin forward with hanging lockers. The heads is a good size with a Jabsco sea toilet ,stainless steel sink and vanity unit. The saloon is large with a converted double berth to port . The dining table folds and has a drinks storage locker in its center. The galley is practically laid out, the oven has a grill and two burners. There is a fridge and plenty of dry storage.The rear cabin has  a double berth and the chart table is amidships to the port side and forward facing.The interior wood work is of the usual Oyster high quality which gives her a very warm and safe feel throughout. Remarks :Fairline Targa 58, 2011 model for sale. Blue/White hull with very low hours on her Volvo 900hp diesels. Offering accommodation for 6 in 3 cabins all en suite , comprising forward master cabin, and 2 single cabins with twin berths. There is also a crew cabin with en suite facilities. Easily handled by the owner having bow and stern thrusters.Fitted with tropical air conditioning and upgraded 18kw generator. Also included is a Williams 385 Jet Tender. Other inventory includes a Water maker and satellite system. Fully equipped galley.With her sweeping curves and spirited performance, the Targa 58 is a stunning motor yacht that’s guaranteed to please. While the ride thrills, the Fairline design hull and deck provide an impressive soft ride sensation. She is the perfect combination of excitement and relaxation, designed to offer flexible space both inside and out which coupled with the sliding hard top over the main deck and sliding port side and starboard side large windows saloon adds tremendous versatility and ensures you can use her throughout the year. Please contact for more information and further photographs.                                                                    Accommodation :                                                                  Inventory :                                                                  Mechanical and Rigging :Fairline Targa 58, 2011 with twin Volvo 900hp diesels, offering a cruising speed of 26knots and a top speed of 32knots. Reliable and economical powertrain, with low hours.

description: Remarks :The Maxi 95 is a cleverly designed family cruiser from the board of Pelle Petersen. They are easily handled, with good performance, and have a light and airy interior with two double sleeping cabins separate from the main accommodation.                                                                  Accommodation :The accommodation offers up to six berths.  There are two sleeping cabins separate from the main accommodation. In the forecabin, V berth with infill and stowage under.  Opening hatch to deck.  In saloon, two settee berths.  The starboard berth converts to a double.  Saloon table with engine under.  Galley to port.  Two burner gimballed gas cooker with grill and oven.  Stainless steel sink with manually pumped water supply.  25-gallon freshwater capacity.  Cool box.  Separate heads compartment to starboard with marine toilet and washbasin. There is a useful stowage area under the cockpit behind the companionway.                                                                    Inventory :Deck Equipment:  1 x Anchor 40m Chain/Warp Mainsail cover Sprayhood Boarding ladder 4 x Fenders 6 x Mooring warps  Navigation Equipment:  Garmin Chartplotter TickTack instruments Compass   Safety Equipment:  Fire blanket Gas alarm Co detector Smoke alarm Jackstays Cockpit harness points Horseshoe lifebuoy Floating light MOB sling Emergency tiller Bilge pump (manual) Radar reflector    Keel Hull: Fin Keel, Wheel steering, Skeg hung rudder                                                                  Mechanical and Rigging :Sails & Rigging: Masthead rigged sloop. Anodised aluminium mast and boom. Stainless steel standing rigging.  Terylene running rigging. Slab reefing to mainsail. Furling headsail system. Some lines led aft to cockpit. Sails 1 x Mainsail 1 x Furling headsail 1 x Asymmetric spinnaker 1 x Symmetric spinnaker Mechanical: Located under the saloon table, Volvo Penta MD11 three-cylinder 28hp diesel engine. Electric start. Freshwater cooled via heat exchanger. Shaft drive to two bladed folding propeller. description: Remarks :Albin Express built by Albin Marine of Sweden to a Peter Norlin design. These have proved very successful boats at club level Europe wide and this particular boat has been a winner for many years in the North East.Has been in present ownership since 2012 and in that time she has been completely overhauled and modernised. Her hull and topsides are gleaming, have new decals and in great shape. Down below has been renovated with new upholstery, varnish work and storage bags.Deck stepped rig replaced in 2006 along with standing rigging. Running rigging is a mixture of dyneema and braid all in good order.Comes complete with suit of Hyde sails including spinnaker. Handy 4 leg yard cradle included in price. Nav aids include compass, VHF and GPS                                                                  Accommodation: :Two berth forepeak with settee berth port and starboard in saloon.Pilot berth on port side.Cushion fabric is smart blue and yacht is finished with varnished mahogany wood panelling.Saloon table is attached to the forward bulkhead when required.The sea toilet is accessed via a hinged cover under the forward bunk.New space saving tidy-alls organisers attached to interior hull.Galley:Galley area on the starboard side, cleverly slides aft and has a sink, gas 2 burner hob, storage unit and hand pumped fresh water.                                                                  Inventory: :Garmain handheld GPS 72 interfaced with VHF (2009)Advansea Multi S400 (2011)XM VHF DSC (2005)Navigation lightsCompassManual bilge pumpFendersBoarding ladderBoathookHorseshoe and lightYard cradleBoom tentFire extinguisher                                                                  Construction: :Designed by Peter Norlin and built by Albin Marin in Sweden in 1982, this fast racer/cruiser's hull and superstructure is constructed in GRP with sandwich deck for additional strength. Cast iron fin keel weighing 800Kgs, which is bolted through hull giving a draft of 1.45M. Transom hung rudder with tiller steering.Deep self bailing cockpit with locker storage and main sheet traveller.Large storage locker to stern for fenders and other boat related equipment.Hull topsides in great shape with new blue decals.Mechanical:The boat is powered by a Mariner 4hp 2-stroke outboard situated on bracket at transom.This long shaft unit has been serviced annually and is great for manoeuvring and pushing the tide.The present owners only use the internal tank to cut down on unnecessary weight but the fittings are there should an external tank be desired.12V system providing navigation and cabin lighting as well as power for instruments.Sails and Rigging:Fractional 7/8ths, deck stepped silver anodised aluminium mast by Z-Spar replaced and with new stainless steel standing rigging in 2006.Running rigging is a mixture of Dyneema and racing braid all in good order.All sails are by Hyde and were introduced in 2015. These include:Main, No1 jib and spinnaker including pole.Also available are a serviceable set of sails including No1 jib, No2 Jib and spinnakerGround Tackle:Bruce anchor with chain and warpFisherman anchor

Remarks :Owners Remarks: 'Since purchasing the boat in 04/16 I have sailed her extensively in the Ionian islands, mainly single-handed. The sails are easy to handle single handed, with the help of the autopilot holding direction. They provide enough drive to take the boat over 6 knots in the right wind conditions. At 2200rpm the engine drives the boat at 5.5 to 6 knots. I set myself a maximum of 2500rpm.   The accommodation is comfortable. I have tended to breakfast and lunch on board while using tavernas in the evening and the on-board facilities have been ideal for this lifestyle. The new refrigeration works very well powered by solar in the cloudless weather.    Much of the work I have had done on the boat is to make single-handing easier. Other work has been to replace or improve parts of the boat expected after 30 years of use.    She is a robust boat designed for British waters which allows her to carry on in conditions when other boats seek shelter. Her shallow depth has often allowed me to find space in crowded anchorages, for example in Lakka.    I am selling her to allow me to build on the experience gained sailing her single-handed by chartering and crewing in other waters.'This Westerly Falcon 34 has been constantly updated and improved. description: Remarks :This Jeanneau 479 Yacht is fully loaded with a performance package and many factory fitted extras and not yet one year old, the first owners have exchanged her for a much bigger yacht. She has a Powerful, balanced modern hull designed by Philippe Briand. Her extended water line length and a hard chine aids this extension of water line and helps her natural speed and increases comfort at sea for all who sail on her. Standard equipment on the Jeanneau 479 being sleek deck lines, Flush hatches and integrated covered running rigging. This makes moving around on deck very safe for crew and all who want to enjoy the deck area of this Yacht without encountering the dangers of a conventional set up. Her sail plan is a high aspect ratio including a factory installed performance rig and sail combination. She comes with a 106% Genoa and also has a large overlapping genoa Code 0 furling system with an extended bow sprit. Lines are led back to helm stations. Included as part of the specification is a remote controlled fold-down transom, this giving easy access to the sea and sundeck. If you are looking for a performance yacht that has virtually all the manufacturers warranty available then this beautiful yacht should be on your list of yachts to visit. description: Remarks :This Degero 28 deckhouse motorsailer is for sale in Christchurch , Dorset. She has been well looked after by her one owner  and is in excellent condition throughout.The Degero 28 motorsailer is built by the Kristeri yard in Finland, they are well built quality deckhouse motorsailers that have earned a reputation as sturdy quality yachts that sail very well. They have produced over 130 of the Degero 28 which is their most successful model to date.She has a long keel , which thanks to extensive lead ballast, allows a shallow draft without sacrificing stiffness and stability.'Anatidae' has a Volvo Penta D1-30 3-cylinder,  naturally aspirated diesel engine  with freshwater cooling. With low cruising rpm, the engine runs quietly with minimal vibrations. The engine has been regularly serviced and has 1000 hours on her.Her interior joinery is in satin finished teak and is in very good order. Her saloon is bright and she has a very high quality feel to her. The heads are a good size and the galley well laid out. She has plenty of storage throughout.The Degero 28 is a comfortable quality motorsailer that will please the skipper who likes to sail . The dual helm position enables all weather sailing.She can be viewed ashore in Christchurch, Dorset. Standing headroom through out.FORECABIN: Double berth with storage under. Deep cabinet with hanging lockers and shelves. Dressing table with large wardrobe to port. En suite heads compartment with Jabsco electric marine toilet with holding tank. Stainless steel wash basin with shower. Electric shower pump out.SALOON: U-shaped settee to starboard round fixed saloon table. Upper storage cabinets. Bench seating to port with storage locker forward and ceiling handrail. Forward facing chart table to port with storage and laptop space. Two plastic storage bins under floor.GALLEY: L-shaped galley aft to starboard with double stainless steel sinks and mixer tap. Large 12v top and front loading fridge. Separate top loading freezer compartment with 'keel cooled' compressor. Gimballed Eno three burner gas cooker with grill and oven. 220v microwave.HEADS: Heads compartment to port with stainless steel wash basin and shower. Electric shower pump out. Jabsco electric marine toilet and holding tank. Aft heads is accessible from both port aft cabin and saloon.AFT CABINS: Two aft double cabins with hanging lockers.Cream leatherette upholstery in saloon. Scatter cushions. Premium mattresses to sleeping cabins. Shades and screens for hatches and ports. All berths with fitted sheets and linen. Crockery, cutlery, utensils, pots and pans included.Hot and cold pressurised fresh water system to galley sink, wash basins and showers. Hot water from 40 litre calorifier heated by engine and immersion heater.Laminate flooring throughout. Flush mounted LED ceiling lights. Leather wrapped LED reading lights to sleeping cabins and chart table. Task lighting to heads and galley.Mechanical SystemsYanmar 4JH4-HTE, four cylinder, 110hp marine diesel engine located under companionway in vented and soundproofed compartment. Fresh water cooled via heat exchanger. Shaft drive via P-bracket to Gori folding three blade propeller. Rope cutter to shaft. Extra high capacity fuel/water separator. Single lever engine controls and engine instrumentation at port helm. Engine serviced every 50 hours with new filters and oil. Gear box serviced annually.MaxPower 12v twin propeller bow thruster with push button control at port helm.Onan 6kw diesel generator located under cockpit floor providing 220v to shore power systems (charger, immersion, ring main). Silver anodised aluminium mast and boom. Stainless steel standing rigging (new 2017). Terylene running rigging all led aft to cockpit. In-mast mainsail furling to mainsail and Facnor headsail furling system. Rigid kicker. Two Harken self tailing primary winches. Electric Harken self tailing halyard/furling winch on port coachroof. Harken self tailing winch on starboard coachroof. Harken genoa tracks and mainsheet traveller. Spinlock jammers. Removable inner forestay with halyard. Spinnaker halyard. description: Remarks :This Camper Nicholson 48 is a perfect long distance blue water cruiser. Extremely well built and now more importantly extremely well maintained and updated by her present owner of 21 years . Her powerful hull and elegant lines make her a safe, stable, comfortable and fast passage maker and she qualifies as MCA code zero so is a genuine go anywhere vessel. She sleeps 8 in four cabins. Has two heads ,one en-suite from the rear master cabin and a well laid out practical galley with plenty of storage throughout. She has hot and cold water with showers in both heads. When in Northern climes she benefits from warm air heating and when in hotter locals she has air conditioning.Cleopatra Nikita has been updated and thoroughly maintained. In 1994 her teak decks were replaced and in 2009 they were fully sanded and re-caulked . All her standing rigging has been replaced within the last 10 years. Her hull is sound as you would expect of a Camper Nicholson and she was copper coated in  March 2013. Her Borg Warner Velvet gearbox was replaced with a re-conditioned unit in 2009 and a new Auto prop fitted in 2013.She is currently lying in Saint Carles Marina (MDL) in Spain and is ready to go on her next adventure.                                                                  Accommodation :The Nicholson 48 provides real comfort for the long-term cruiser. She has all the luxuries needed to keep the most demanding crew happy. Heating and air-conditioning , hot showers in both heads and a deck shower, a great galley with refrigerator, cold box, microwave, cooker and plenty of dry storage. A substantial wet locker for oilies and sea boots. Each cabin has a full length wardrobe with under berth storage to meet the demands of the full time cruiser.Saloon, galley and aft cabin now have LED lighting and she has red lights throughout.She sleeps 8 in total. The forward cabin is large with a twin berth ,the saloon provides a large double . There is a very secure sea berth in the passage cabin midships .The wonderful owners aft cabin has a large double and a single. The double berth has been widened by the current owners and is considerably wider then the standard double shown on the plan.  Both heads have modern toilets, hot showers and vanity units with washbasinThe saloon has ample book shelves and cupboard storage and seats 8 comfortably. The dinning table folds in two and has fiddles.The whole interior of Cleopatra Nikita is fitted out in quality teak and this gives her a warm and cosy feeling throughout. description: Remarks :This Sovereign 54 is probably the best value for money on the market at the moment. She benefits from a full inventory and equipment list, and must be viewed to be fully appreciated. Possessing sleek lines combined with powerful sailing performance makes her an extremely desirable yacht. Designed by Phil Southwell,  Cariad is one of the last to be built by John Robertson Yachts at the Farrocean Yacht Yard in Cape Town, South Africa in 1994 (14 in total).The hull and deck are constructed in GRP sandwich with a NGP Isophthaul gelcoat. Internal longitudinal girders and transverse floors provide hull stiffness. The deck and hull are joined by bonding compound and glassed with GRP strapping, forming a strong monocoque structure. The hull below the waterline was recoated with Seajet, anti-osmosis epoxy in 2016.Owner's comments: “The boat is currently moored in Gouvia Marina, on the east coast of the Ionian Island of Corfu. I often cruise the yacht with my wife; large distances are easily covered. However, with a full crew, she can be configured to be a totally different machine. A typical example is that we have just completed the 2016 South Ionian Regatta which numbered 186 starters. We finished 6th across the line, crewed by myself and three relatively inexperienced friends. During this year’s regatta we encountered extremely variable weather with some winds achieving 35 knots, which presented no problems whatsoever.“ description: Remarks :Well equipped motor cruiser ideal for lake or coastal cruising. GRP constructed motor yacht with planing hull and moulded spray strakes. Bathing platform is integrated to hull moulding giving greater stability and reduces slap when at anchor. Aft cockpit entered from bathing platform with padded bench seating. The cockpit sole lifts on a gas assisted strut allowing access to the twin engines. Step up and it takes you to the upper cockpit with large upholstered seating area to port. This area was recovered in 2010 and has a large removable table for entertaining. This area also converts to a large sunpad. There is a handy cockpit sink with ample storage below. Opposite the seating area is the helm position with large dash with instrumentation for engines and dual control throttle controls.Large tempered glass windscreen with access to large sundeck with hand rails. foredeck is protected by stainless steel guardrails.                                                                  Accommodation :Below deck is entered via the cockpit through lockable plexiglass door, aft on the portside is the aft cabin  with privacy curtain a 60“x 80“ berth that has a removable section that converts to bench seat. This has drawer storage below. seperate hanging locker, deck hatch and port light allow ventilation and natural light. Three additional electric lights and electric socket. The saloon on portside is a large comfortable dinette with storage below, this converts into 40“ x 78“ berth. There are large side windows with curtains and a deck hatch for natural light. Forward of this area and in the bow section is a double V berth measuring 90“ x 68“. There is ample storage below and also features two reading lights and port lights either side of the hull.Aft and on the starboard side is the galley with large work surfaces, stainless steel with pressurised hot and cold water and 2 burner Origo dual fuel stove. Large capacity Norcold fridge with small freezer section. Good storage with cupboards and drawers, microwave oven fitted in recess.Hot and cold pressurised waterGalley with microwave, hob and fridgeConvertible dinetteOpening port lights and deck hatches12v Lighting                                                                  Inventory :InventoryRitchie CompassDepth SounderSpeed/logVHF radioAnchor with chain and warpHornElectric and manual bilge pumpsBoathookNavigation lightsBoarding ladderFendersFull cockpit coverCD playerSearchlightBathing platform with built in ladderBow platform with anchor rollerMooring cleatsDrinks holderCockpit sinkRadar arch with recessed lightingTransom shower                                                                  Construction, Mechanical and Rigging :Powered by twin Mercruiser 5.0L petrol engines with Alpha outdrives developing 230hp. Vessel is driven from the upper cockpit giving great visibility when manoeuvering. Display panel include rev counter, speed, temperature. oil pressure and voltmeter. seperate fuel gauge with sender unit. Top mounted engine controls with built in trim and tilt function.12v bank of batteries recharged from engine alternators, there is also a battery charger operational when hooked up to shore power.Battery bank with isolatorsShore powerBattery chargerStainless steel steering wheelEngine room blowersPower steeringHydraulic trim tabs. All works carried out in 2016/17 New Transom Assemblies (and rams) Fitted.Outdrives Professionally Refurbished.New Props.New Exhaust Ports.Both engines been taken out and fully serviced Canopy Professionally Cleaned and Refurbished.New Battery Charger Fitted.New water pump fitted.New Jabsco Toilet Pump Fitted. Anti-fouled in March 2016.Very low engine hours.New 110 Battery Fitted.

description: Idéal pour la ballade en famille ou une sortie pêche entre amis.

Remarks :This is a big powerful boat, designed and built in 1981 for the first owner to undertake blue water voyages in comfort and safety. Her design and construction was focused towards creating a top class ocean yacht, and recent voyages with the present owner have proved her to be just that. Curtis and Pape built all manner of boats having started with fishing boats and diverging into the yachting market with many different designs of motor and sailing yachts. The present owner undertook a major refit in 2006/2007 which included a complete new rig to a slightly altered design. The design work was carried out by the renowned Ed Burnett and saw several small changes that have improved the handling and performance of the boat. Many other big jobs were undertaken including removal and replacement of floors and floor bolts and new keel bolts. After that she completed a voyage to circumnavigate South America via the Magellan Straits which she did successfully, battling incredibly bad weather at times and clocking up very respectable daily log readings.The size and dimensions of the boat give her a lot of interior volume and make her a very comfortable yacht for extended periods. Sold with a full inventory for long distance sailing and a very impressive history.CONSTRUCTION:HullIron planing all copper rivet fastened to steamed oak frames. Heavy grown oak floors throughout all copper fastened. Galvanised steel mast step integrated with the floors spreads the load of the rig.Large section beam shelf with a clamp the full length of the hull makes the hull extremely stiff and strong.Deck and cockpitLarge section sawn deck beams notched onto the beamshelf. Yacht laid teak deck screwed and glued to a marine plywood subdeck.Large cockpit with a self draining well and wheel steering on a central pedestal. Spray hood over the coachroof with a centreline companion hatch. Very large cockpit locker to port. Spacious lazaretto locker with a large hatch on the aft deck.SuperstructureVarnished marine plywood coachroof coamings with reinforced glass windows recessed in.Forward coachroof with solid varnished mahogany coamings and an aluminium Lewmar hatch gives full standing headroom in the forecabin.                                                                   Accommodation :Berths7 berths in 2 sleeping cabins and the saloon. Forecabin with twin V berths and full standing headroom (newly painted in 2017).Cabin to port at the forward end of the saloon with a large double berth.2 saloon berths. Quarter berth to starboard.SaloonCompanion steps down into the saloon over the engine box.Forward facing chart table to starboard uses the head of the quarter berth as a seat.Galley on the starboard side under the deckhead.U-shape settee berth to port with a collapsible saloon table. All upholstery new in 2010.Passageway going forward on the starboard side with a single berth and substantial stowage lockers under the deckhead.The saloon is very spacious because of the high freeboard and good depth in hold and large beam.Joinery constructed with mahogany veneered marine plywood, masses of storage capacity in lockers throughout the saloon.HeadsHeads compartment to port by the forward passage. Jabsco sea toilet pumps directly overboard or to holding tank.Hand basin and shower grains to a small grey tank and pumped overboard.holding tank fitted in 2017 and painted throughout.GalleyGas cooker with 2 burner hob, oven and grill.24V fridge.Single stainless sink with pressurised hot and cold water puts a hand pumped sea water tap.Hot water via an engine heated clarifier or mains.                                                                   Inventory :SailsHeavy duty Mainsail, slab reefing with lazyjacks. All sails made by Hyde in 2007 unless stated otherwise.Mizzen (new in 2007)Yankee (new in 2013)StaysailStorm jib (unused)Trisail (unused)JennekerSpinnakerFurling headsailWinches Cockpit has a pair 2 x harken 44ST. 2 x Lewmar ST.Mizzen Halyard - Andersen ST.Main mast - 3 x AndersenST including 1 for reefing.TanksFuel 400 LitresFresh waster 500 LitresBilge Pumps 2 manual1 automaticNavigationSteering compassSpeed/logEcho sounderGPSEPIRBVHFAutopilotSee Me active radar reflectorNav lightsSafetyLifeslingDanbuoyLifebuoyFire blanketFlaresFire extinguishersGround tackle2 anchors40m chainElectric windlassGear Boarding ladderPulpit and pushpitFendersBoathookSprayhoodCutlery, crockery and utensils                                                                  Mechanical and Rigging :RIGBermudan yawl with a cutter head which gives a large amount of variation in rig configuration which in ideal for ocean cruising. The entire rig was new in 2007 after a slight re-design by Ed Burnett.Aluminium keel stepped masts, both replaced in 2007. description: Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 44i; LOA 13.75m; Faisceau 4,37 m; Tirage 2.05m; Quille de nageoire avec ampoule; Positions de la barre jumelée; Disposition de 3 cabines; Jusqu'à 12 couchettes; 3 têtes avec réservoirs de retenue; Capacité de carburant de 240 litres; Capacité d'eau douce de 615 litres; 56hp Yanmar 4JH4AE moteur diesel à 4 cylindres; Grand volet de voûtes classiques; Génois enrouleur; 12v réfrigérateur; Cuisinière 2 feux avec four et gril; Sondeur de profondeur; Radio VHF; pilote automatique; Traceur de cartes; instruments à vent; Guindeau électrique d'ancre; propulseur d'étrave; Radeau de sauvetage et équipement de sécurité. REMARQUES DU CONSTRUCTEUR: Avec un design attrayant, le Sun Odyssey 44i est un pur plaisir de navigation. Conceptué en utilisant le logiciel de conception le plus puissant sur le marché, ce voilier robuste et marin se adapte parfaitement aux différents types de voile. Concepteur de renommée internationale, Philippe Briand a combiné ses talents avec ceux de l'équipe de design Jeanneau pour un mélange prodigieux de force technique et de performances exceptionnelles. De tous les angles, ses lignes élégantes et son intérieur modulaire et spacieux vous intéresseront certainement. Pour le passage, chaque partie contribue au plaisir de naviguer dans les eaux ouvertes en toute sécurité. Pour plus de confort et de commodité, chaque version peut être adaptée à l'usage d'un propriétaire ou à la charte. Quelle que soit la saison ou les conditions de la mer, le Sun Odyssey 44i peut parcourir la distance. Vous trouverez des caractéristiques de design confortables dans le poste de pilotage, à la barre et dans chaque cabine. Allez-y, prenez la mer avec un esprit insouciant!
